name: Classic Lasagna
instructions: In a large pot, brown ground beef with onion and garlic. Drain excess fat.
Stir in crushed tomatoes, tomato sauce, water, salt, pepper, oregano, and thyme. Simmer for 30 minutes.
Cook lasagna noodles according to package directions. Drain.
In a medium bowl, mix ricotta, egg, and Parmesan cheese.
Preheat oven to 375째F (190째C).
Spread a thin layer of meat sauce on the bottom of a 9x13 inch baking dish.
Arrange 4 noodles lengthwise over the sauce. Spread with half of the ricotta mixture. Top with a third of the mozzarella cheese and a third of the meat sauce.
Repeat layers once more. Top with the remaining 4 noodles, ricotta mixture, mozzarella cheese, and meat sauce.
Bake for 25 minutes. Let stand for 10 minutes before serving.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
ingredients: 1 lb boneless, skinless chicken breast, cut into 1-inch cubes
instructions: In a bowl, combine chicken, yogurt, lemon juice, cumin, paprika, turmeric, garam masala, and salt. Mix well and marinate for at least 30 minutes.
In a large skillet, heat oil over medium-high heat. Add onion and cook until softened.
Stir in garlic and ginger and cook for 1 minute.
Add the marinated chicken and cook until browned on all sides.
Pour in crushed tomatoes and bring to a simmer. Reduce heat to low, cover, and cook for 20 minutes.
Stir in heavy cream and cilantro. Cook for 5 more minutes.
Serve hot with rice or naan.

name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
instructions: In a small bowl, whisk together soy sauce, cornstarch, honey, ginger, and garlic. Add water and set aside.
Heat vegetable oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat.
Add broccoli, red bell pepper, and carrot. Stir-fry for 3-5 minutes.
Add snap peas and continue to stir-fry for 2 more minutes.
Pour the sauce over the vegetables and stir until the sauce has thickened and the vegetables are coated.
Serve hot over rice.

name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: Preheat oven to 375째F (190째C).
In a large bowl, cream together butter, white sugar, and brown sugar until smooth.
Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla.
In a separate bowl, whisk together flour, baking soda, and salt.
Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients and mix until just combined.
Stir in the chocolate chips.
Drop rounded tablespoons of dough onto ungreased baking sheets.
Bake for 10-12 minutes or until golden brown. Let cool on the baking sheets for a few minutes before transferring to wire racks to cool completely.

name: Pasta Carbonara
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook spaghetti according to package directions.
While the pasta is cooking, cook pancetta in a skillet over medium heat until crispy. Remove pancetta and set aside, leaving the rendered fat in the skillet.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs, Parmesan, Pecorino Romano, and black pepper.
Drain the pasta, reserving 1/2 cup of the pasta water.
Add the hot, drained pasta to the skillet with the pancetta fat. Stir in garlic and cook for 1 minute.
Remove the skillet from the heat. Quickly pour the egg and cheese mixture over the pasta, tossing constantly to coat the pasta. The heat from the pasta will cook the eggs.
If the sauce is too thick, add a tablespoon or two of the reserved pasta water to reach the desired consistency.
Stir in the crispy pancetta and serve immediately.

name: Mediterranean Quinoa Salad
instructions: In a small pot, bring water and quinoa to a boil. Reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer for 15 minutes, or until the water is absorbed.
Fluff the quinoa with a fork and let it cool.
In a large bowl, combine the cooled quinoa, cucumber, tomatoes, red onion, feta cheese, and parsley.
In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Pour the dressing over the salad and toss to combine.
Serve chilled or at room temperature.

name: Caprese Skewers
instructions: Thread one cherry tomato, one mozzarella ball, and one basil leaf onto each skewer.
Arrange the skewers on a platter.
Drizzle with balsamic glaze just before serving.

name: Homemade Pizza
instructions: Preheat oven to 400째F (200째C).
Place the pizza crust on a baking sheet.
Spread pizza sauce evenly over the crust.
Sprinkle with mozzarella cheese.
Arrange pepperoni, mushrooms, and green bell pepper on top of the cheese.
Bake for 12-15 minutes, or until the crust is golden and the cheese is bubbly.
Slice and serve hot.

name: Caesar Salad
instructions: In a large bowl, combine the chopped romaine lettuce, croutons, and Parmesan cheese.
Pour the Caesar dressing over the salad and toss to coat.
Serve immediately.

name: Beef Tacos
instructions: In a large skillet, brown ground beef over medium-high heat. Drain excess fat.
Stir in taco seasoning and water. Bring to a simmer and cook for 5 minutes.
Warm taco shells according to package directions.
Fill each taco shell with the seasoned ground beef.
Top with lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, sour cream, and salsa.
Serve immediately.

name: Chicken Noodle Soup
ingredients: salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: In a large pot, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add carrots, celery, and onion. Cook until softened, about 5-7 minutes.
Stir in garlic and cook for 1 more minute.
Pour in chicken broth and bring to a boil. Add shredded chicken, egg noodles, thyme, and rosemary.
Reduce heat and simmer for 10-15 minutes, or until the noodles are cooked through.
Season with salt and black pepper to taste.
Serve hot.

name: Shrimp Scampi
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook linguine according to package directions. Drain.
While the pasta is cooking, heat olive oil and butter in a large skillet over medium heat.
Add garlic and red pepper flakes. Cook for 1 minute until fragrant.
Add shrimp to the skillet and cook until pink, about 2-3 minutes per side.
Pour in white wine and lemon juice. Bring to a simmer.
Add the drained linguine to the skillet and toss to coat with the sauce.
Stir in fresh parsley.
Serve hot.

name: Bruschetta
ingredients: salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Preheat oven to 400째F (200째C).
Place baguette slices on a baking sheet. Brush with olive oil.
Bake for 5-7 minutes, or until lightly toasted.
While the bread is toasting, combine chopped tomatoes, basil, and balsamic glaze in a bowl. Season with salt and pepper.
Rub the toasted bread with the peeled garlic cloves.
Top each slice of bread with the tomato mixture.
Serve immediately.

name: Chicken Quesadillas
ingredients: 1 cup shredded cheddar and Monterey Jack cheese blend
salsa, sour cream, and guacamole for serving
instructions: In a skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add onion and bell pepper and cook until softened.
Add shredded chicken and cook until heated through.
Place one tortilla in a clean skillet over medium heat. Sprinkle half of the cheese over the tortilla.
Spread the chicken and vegetable mixture over the cheese. Sprinkle with the remaining cheese.
Top with the second tortilla. Cook for 2-3 minutes per side, or until the cheese is melted and the tortilla is golden brown.
Cut into wedges and serve with salsa, sour cream, and guacamole.

name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
instructions: Spread butter on one side of each slice of bread.
Place one slice of bread, butter-side down, in a skillet over medium heat.
Top with the cheese slices, then the second slice of bread, butter-side up.
Cook for 2-3 minutes per side, or until the bread is golden brown and the cheese is melted.
Serve hot.

name: Classic Pancakes
instructions: In a large bowl, whisk together flour, baking powder, salt and sugar.
In a separate bowl, whisk together milk, egg and melted butter.
Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and stir until just combined. Do not overmix.
Heat a lightly oiled griddle or frying pan over medium-high heat.
Pour 쩌 cup of batter onto the griddle for each pancake. Cook for 2-3 minutes per side, or until golden brown.
Serve hot with butter and maple syrup.

name: Fresh Tomato Salsa
instructions: In a medium bowl, combine the chopped tomatoes, red onion, jalape챰o, and cilantro.
Stir in the lime juice and salt.
Serve immediately with tortilla chips or cover and refrigerate for up to 2 hours to allow the flavors to meld.

name: Guacamole
instructions: In a medium bowl, mash the avocados with a fork.
Stir in the lime juice, red onion, jalape챰o, cilantro, and salt.
Serve immediately with tortilla chips or cover with plastic wrap pressed directly onto the surface of the guacamole and refrigerate for up to 2 hours.

name: Chicken and Dumplings
ingredients: salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: In a large pot, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add carrots, celery, and onion. Cook until softened, about 5-7 minutes.
Stir in garlic and cook for 1 more minute.
Pour in chicken broth and bring to a boil. Add shredded chicken, thyme, and rosemary.
In a separate bowl, whisk together flour, baking powder, and salt. Stir in milk and melted butter until just combined.
Drop the dumpling batter by spoonfuls into the simmering soup.
Reduce heat to low, cover, and cook for 15 minutes, or until the dumplings are cooked through.
Season with salt and black pepper to taste.
Serve hot.

name: Baked Ziti
instructions: Preheat oven to 375째F (190째C).
Cook ziti pasta according to package directions. Drain.
In a large pot, brown ground beef with onion and garlic. Drain excess fat.
Stir in crushed tomatoes, tomato sauce, salt, pepper, oregano, and basil. Simmer for 15 minutes.
In a medium bowl, mix ricotta, egg, and Parmesan cheese.
In a large bowl, combine the cooked pasta, meat sauce, ricotta mixture, and half of the mozzarella cheese.
Pour the mixture into a 9x13 inch baking dish. Top with the remaining mozzarella cheese.
Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until the cheese is bubbly and golden brown.
Let stand for 10 minutes before serving.

name: Chicken and Waffles
ingredients: 1 lb boneless, skinless chicken breast, cut into strips
instructions: In a shallow dish, combine flour, paprika, cayenne pepper, garlic powder, onion powder, salt, and black pepper.
In a separate shallow dish, whisk together egg and milk.
Dip each chicken strip into the milk mixture, then dredge in the flour mixture, pressing to coat.
Heat vegetable oil in a large skillet to 350째F (175째C).
Fry the chicken strips for 3-4 minutes per side, or until golden brown and cooked through. Drain on a paper towel-lined plate.
Serve the fried chicken on top of the toasted waffles. Drizzle with maple syrup.

name: Beef Stroganoff
ingredients: salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Cook egg noodles according to package directions. Drain and set aside.
While the noodles are cooking, heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add beef and cook until browned.
Remove beef from the skillet and set aside.
Add onion and mushrooms to the skillet and cook until softened.
Stir in garlic and cook for 1 more minute.
Pour in beef broth and bring to a simmer, scraping up any browned bits from the bottom of the skillet.
In a small bowl, whisk together sour cream, heavy cream, Dijon mustard, and paprika.
Reduce heat to low and stir the sour cream mixture into the skillet. Return the beef to the skillet and cook for 2-3 minutes, or until heated through. Do not boil.
Season with salt and black pepper to taste.
Serve the beef and sauce over the cooked egg noodles.

name: Shepherd's Pie
ingredients: salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Preheat oven to 375째F (190째C).
In a large pot, boil potatoes until tender. Drain and mash with milk and butter. Season with salt and pepper.
While the potatoes are boiling, heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add ground meat and cook until browned. Drain excess fat.
Add onion, carrots, and celery to the skillet. Cook until softened.
Stir in garlic, tomato paste, thyme, and rosemary. Cook for 1 minute.
Pour in beef broth and red wine (if using). Bring to a simmer and cook for 10 minutes, or until the sauce has thickened.
Season with salt and black pepper to taste.
Pour the meat mixture into a 9x13 inch baking dish. Top with the mashed potatoes, spreading evenly.
Use a fork to create ridges on the mashed potato topping.
Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until the topping is golden brown and the filling is bubbly.

name: Pad Thai
instructions: Soak rice noodles in warm water for 30 minutes, or until softened. Drain and set aside.
In a small bowl, whisk together fish sauce, tamarind paste, lime juice, brown sugar, and red pepper flakes. Set aside.
Heat vegetable oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add garlic and shrimp. Cook until shrimp is pink.
Push the shrimp and garlic to one side of the skillet. Pour the scrambled egg onto the other side and cook until set. Break up the egg with a spatula.
Add the softened noodles and the sauce to the skillet. Toss to combine and cook for 2-3 minutes.
Stir in bean sprouts and half of the peanuts. Toss to combine.
Serve hot, garnished with the remaining peanuts and fresh cilantro.

name: Chicken Parmesan
instructions: Preheat oven to 400째F (200째C).
Pound each chicken breast to a uniform thickness.
In a shallow dish, combine flour, salt, and black pepper.
In a separate shallow dish, place the beaten eggs.
In a third shallow dish, combine breadcrumbs and Parmesan cheese.
Dredge each chicken breast in the flour, then dip in the egg, and finally coat in the breadcrumb mixture, pressing to adhere.
Heat vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Fry the chicken for 3-4 minutes per side, or until golden brown.
Transfer the fried chicken to a baking dish. Top each piece with marinara sauce and mozzarella cheese.
Bake for 10-15 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.

name: Black Bean Burgers
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can black beans, rinsed and mashed
salt and black pepper to taste
lettuce, tomato, and avocado for serving
instructions: In a large bowl, combine the mashed black beans, breadcrumbs, onion, bell pepper, garlic, cumin, chili powder, cilantro, egg, salt, and black pepper.
Mix well and form into 4 patties.
Heat a lightly oiled skillet over medium-high heat. Cook the patties for 3-4 minutes per side, or until golden brown.
Serve the patties on the hamburger buns with lettuce, tomato, and avocado.

name: Fish and Chips
ingredients: 1 lb cod fillets, cut into 2-inch pieces
instructions: In a small bowl, whisk together flour, baking powder, salt, and black pepper. Stir in the cold beer until just combined.
Heat vegetable oil in a large pot or deep fryer to 375째F (190째C).
Fry the potatoes in batches until golden brown and crispy. Drain on a paper towel-lined plate and season with salt.
Dip each piece of cod into the batter, letting any excess drip off.
Carefully place the battered fish in the hot oil. Fry for 3-4 minutes per side, or until golden brown and cooked through. Drain on a paper towel-lined plate.
Serve the fried fish with the fries.

name: Chicken Pot Pie
ingredients: salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Preheat oven to 400째F (200째C).
In a large pot, melt butter over medium heat. Add onion, carrots, and celery. Cook until softened, about 5-7 minutes.
Stir in flour and cook for 1 more minute.
Gradually whisk in chicken broth and heavy cream. Bring to a simmer, stirring constantly, until the sauce has thickened.
Stir in shredded chicken, peas, and thyme. Season with salt and black pepper to taste.
Pour the mixture into a 9-inch pie dish.
Place the puff pastry sheet over the pie dish, pressing it down the sides. Cut a few slits in the top to allow steam to escape.
Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown and the filling is bubbly.

name: Chicken Fajitas
ingredients: 1 lb boneless, skinless chicken breast, cut into strips
salsa, sour cream, and guacamole for serving
instructions: In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium-high heat. Add chicken strips and cook until browned.
Add onion and bell peppers. Cook until softened, about 5-7 minutes.
Stir in the fajita seasoning and cook for 1 more minute.
Warm the tortillas according to package directions.
Serve the chicken and vegetable mixture in the warm tortillas with salsa, sour cream, and guacamole.

name: Broccoli Cheddar Soup
ingredients: salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: In a large pot, melt butter over medium heat. Add onion and carrots. Cook until softened, about 5-7 minutes.
Add broccoli florets and cook for 2 more minutes.
Pour in chicken or vegetable broth and bring to a simmer. Cook for 10-15 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender.
Using an immersion blender, blend the soup until smooth. Alternatively, transfer the soup to a regular blender and blend in batches.
Stir in heavy cream and cheddar cheese. Cook until the cheese is melted and the soup is smooth. Do not boil.
Season with nutmeg, salt, and black pepper to taste.
Serve hot.

name: Lemon Herb Roasted Chicken
ingredients: salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Preheat oven to 425째F (220째C).
Pat the chicken dry with paper towels.
Rub the chicken all over with olive oil. Season with salt and black pepper.
Stuff the chicken cavity with the lemon halves, garlic halves, and onion quarters.
Sprinkle the chopped rosemary and thyme over the chicken.
Place the chicken in a roasting pan and roast for 1 hour and 15 minutes, or until a meat thermometer inserted into the thickest part of the thigh reads 165째F (74째C).
Let the chicken rest for 10 minutes before carving and serving.

name: Spaghetti and Meatballs
instructions: In a large bowl, combine ground beef, breadcrumbs, Parmesan cheese, egg, garlic, parsley, salt, and black pepper. Mix well and form into 1-inch meatballs.
In a large pot, bring a pot of salted water to a boil. Cook spaghetti according to package directions. Drain.
While the pasta is cooking, brown the meatballs in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Drain excess fat.
Pour in crushed tomatoes and tomato sauce. Bring to a simmer, then reduce heat to low, cover, and cook for 20 minutes, or until the meatballs are cooked through.
Serve the meatballs and sauce over the cooked spaghetti.

name: Chicken Tenders
instructions: In a shallow dish, combine flour, salt, and black pepper.
In a separate shallow dish, place the beaten eggs.
In a third shallow dish, place the breadcrumbs.
Dredge each chicken tender in the flour, then dip in the egg, and finally coat in the breadcrumbs.
Heat vegetable oil in a large skillet or deep fryer to 350째F (175째C).
Fry the chicken tenders in batches for 3-4 minutes per side, or until golden brown and cooked through. Drain on a paper towel-lined plate.
Serve with your favorite dipping sauces.

name: Creamy Tomato Soup
ingredients: salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: In a large pot, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
Stir in garlic and cook for 1 more minute.
Pour in crushed tomatoes and vegetable broth. Bring to a simmer.
Using an immersion blender, blend the soup until smooth. Alternatively, transfer the soup to a regular blender and blend in batches.
Stir in heavy cream and dried basil. Cook for 2-3 minutes, or until heated through. Do not boil.
Season with salt and black pepper to taste.
Serve hot with a dollop of sour cream or croutons.

name: Apple Pie
ingredients: 1 tablespoon butter, cut into small pieces
instructions: Preheat oven to 425째F (220째C).
In a large bowl, toss the sliced apples with white sugar, brown sugar, flour, cinnamon, nutmeg, and lemon juice.
Place one pie crust in a 9-inch pie dish. Pour the apple mixture into the crust.
Dot with the pieces of butter.
Top with the second pie crust, crimping the edges to seal. Cut a few slits in the top to allow steam to escape.
Bake for 15 minutes, then reduce the oven temperature to 375째F (190째C) and bake for an additional 40-45 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown and the filling is bubbly.

name: Grilled Salmon
instructions: Preheat grill to medium-high heat.
Brush the salmon fillets with olive oil. Season with salt and black pepper.
Place the salmon on the grill, skin-side down. Top with a slice of lemon and sprinkle with fresh dill.
Grill for 6-8 minutes, or until the salmon is cooked through and flakes easily with a fork.

name: Chicken Curry
ingredients: 1 lb boneless, skinless chicken breast, cut into 1-inch cubes
salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: In a large pot, heat vegetable oil over medium-high heat. Add onion and cook until softened.
Stir in garlic and ginger and cook for 1 minute.
Add chicken and cook until browned on all sides.
Stir in curry powder, turmeric, and garam masala. Cook for 1 more minute.
Pour in crushed tomatoes and coconut milk. Bring to a simmer, then reduce heat to low, cover, and cook for 20 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through.
Season with salt and black pepper to taste.
Stir in fresh cilantro and serve hot with rice.

name: Vegetable Fried Rice
instructions: In a large skillet or wok, heat vegetable oil over medium-high heat. Add carrots, peas, and onion. Cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
Stir in garlic and cook for 1 more minute.
Push the vegetables to one side of the skillet. Pour the beaten eggs onto the other side and cook, scrambling with a spatula.
Stir the vegetables and eggs together. Add the chilled cooked rice and stir to combine.
Pour in the soy sauce and sesame oil. Stir-fry for 3-5 minutes, or until the rice is heated through and the flavors have melded.
Serve hot.

name: Tuna Salad Sandwich
ingredients: salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: In a medium bowl, combine tuna, mayonnaise, celery, red onion, and Dijon mustard. Mix well.
Season with salt and black pepper to taste.
Spread the tuna salad on one slice of bread. Top with lettuce and the second slice of bread.
Serve immediately.

name: Chicken Alfredo
ingredients: 2 boneless, skinless chicken breasts, cut into cubes
salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Cook fettuccine according to package directions. Drain.
While the pasta is cooking, heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add chicken cubes and cook until browned and cooked through.
Remove chicken from the skillet and set aside.
Reduce heat to low. Add garlic to the skillet and cook for 1 minute until fragrant.
Pour in heavy cream and bring to a simmer. Cook for 3-5 minutes, or until the sauce has thickened.
Stir in Parmesan cheese until melted and the sauce is smooth.
Add the cooked fettuccine and chicken to the skillet. Toss to coat with the sauce.
Season with salt and black pepper to taste. Stir in fresh parsley.
Serve hot.

name: Mango Salsa
instructions: In a medium bowl, combine the diced mangoes, red bell pepper, red onion, jalape챰o, and cilantro.
Stir in the lime juice and salt.
Serve immediately with tortilla chips or grilled chicken or fish.

name: Chicken and Broccoli Stir-Fry
ingredients: 1 lb boneless, skinless chicken breast, cut into strips
1 large head of broccoli, cut into florets
instructions: In a small bowl, whisk together soy sauce, cornstarch, honey, ginger, and garlic. Add water and set aside.
Heat vegetable oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add chicken strips and cook until browned and cooked through.
Add broccoli florets and red bell pepper. Stir-fry for 5-7 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender-crisp.
Pour the sauce over the chicken and vegetables and stir until the sauce has thickened and everything is coated.
Serve hot over rice.

name: Mashed Potatoes
ingredients: salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: In a large pot, boil potatoes until tender. Drain well.
Return the potatoes to the pot. Mash with milk and butter.
Season with salt and black pepper to taste.
Serve hot.

name: Chicken Noodle Casserole
ingredients: 1 (10.5 ounce) can cream of chicken soup
instructions: Preheat oven to 375째F (190째C).
Cook egg noodles according to package directions. Drain.
In a large bowl, combine the cooked egg noodles, shredded chicken, cream of chicken soup, milk, and frozen peas and carrots.
Stir until everything is well combined.
Pour the mixture into an 8x8 inch baking dish. Top with the shredded cheddar cheese and crushed potato chips (if using).
Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until the casserole is bubbly and the cheese is melted.
Serve hot.

name: Smashed Potatoes
instructions: Preheat oven to 425째F (220째C).
In a large pot, boil potatoes until tender. Drain well.
Place the boiled potatoes on a baking sheet. Using a fork or the bottom of a glass, gently smash each potato until it is flattened.
Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and black pepper.
Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until the potatoes are golden brown and crispy.
Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese and fresh parsley before serving.

name: Chicken and Rice
ingredients: 1 lb boneless, skinless chicken breast, cut into cubes
salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: In a large pot, heat olive oil over medium-high heat. Add chicken cubes and cook until browned on all sides.
Remove chicken from the pot and set aside.
Add onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
Stir in garlic and cook for 1 more minute.
Add rice and stir to coat. Pour in chicken broth and bring to a boil.
Return the chicken to the pot. Stir in frozen peas and carrots and thyme. Season with salt and black pepper.
Reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer for 20 minutes, or until the rice is cooked through and the liquid has been absorbed.
Serve hot.

name: Beef and Broccoli
ingredients: 1 large head of broccoli, cut into florets
instructions: In a small bowl, whisk together soy sauce, cornstarch, honey, ginger, and garlic. Add water and set aside.
Heat vegetable oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add beef and cook until browned.
Add broccoli florets and stir-fry for 5-7 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender-crisp.
Pour the sauce over the beef and vegetables and stir until the sauce has thickened and everything is coated.
Serve hot over rice.

name: Chicken Caesar Salad
ingredients: salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium-high heat. Season chicken breasts with salt and black pepper.
Cook the chicken for 5-7 minutes per side, or until cooked through. Let rest for 5 minutes, then slice.
In a large bowl, combine the chopped romaine lettuce, croutons, and Parmesan cheese.
Pour the Caesar dressing over the salad and toss to coat.
Top with the sliced chicken and serve immediately.

name: Chicken and Dumplings
ingredients: salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: In a large pot, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add carrots, celery, and onion. Cook until softened, about 5-7 minutes.
Stir in garlic and cook for 1 more minute.
Pour in chicken broth and bring to a boil. Add shredded chicken, thyme, and rosemary.
In a separate bowl, whisk together flour, baking powder, and salt. Stir in milk and melted butter until just combined.
Drop the dumpling batter by spoonfuls into the simmering soup.
Reduce heat to low, cover, and cook for 15 minutes, or until the dumplings are cooked through.
Season with salt and black pepper to taste.
Serve hot.

name: Baked Ziti
instructions: Preheat oven to 375째F (190째C).
Cook ziti pasta according to package directions. Drain.
In a large pot, brown ground beef with onion and garlic. Drain excess fat.
Stir in crushed tomatoes, tomato sauce, salt, pepper, oregano, and basil. Simmer for 15 minutes.
In a medium bowl, mix ricotta, egg, and Parmesan cheese.
In a large bowl, combine the cooked pasta, meat sauce, ricotta mixture, and half of the mozzarella cheese.
Pour the mixture into a 9x13 inch baking dish. Top with the remaining mozzarella cheese.
Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until the cheese is bubbly and golden brown.
Let stand for 10 minutes before serving.

name: Chicken and Waffles
ingredients: 1 lb boneless, skinless chicken breast, cut into strips
instructions: In a shallow dish, combine flour, paprika, cayenne pepper, garlic powder, onion powder, salt, and black pepper.
In a separate shallow dish, whisk together egg and milk.
Dip each chicken strip into the milk mixture, then dredge in the flour mixture, pressing to coat.
Heat vegetable oil in a large skillet to 350째F (175째C).
Fry the chicken strips for 3-4 minutes per side, or until golden brown and cooked through. Drain on a paper towel-lined plate.
Serve the fried chicken on top of the toasted waffles. Drizzle with maple syrup.

name: Beef Stroganoff
ingredients: salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Cook egg noodles according to package directions. Drain and set aside.
While the noodles are cooking, heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add beef and cook until browned.
Remove beef from the skillet and set aside.
Add onion and mushrooms to the skillet and cook until softened.
Stir in garlic and cook for 1 more minute.
Pour in beef broth and bring to a simmer, scraping up any browned bits from the bottom of the skillet.
In a small bowl, whisk together sour cream, heavy cream, Dijon mustard, and paprika.
Reduce heat to low and stir the sour cream mixture into the skillet. Return the beef to the skillet and cook for 2-3 minutes, or until heated through. Do not boil.
Season with salt and black pepper to taste.
Serve the beef and sauce over the cooked egg noodles.

name: Shepherd's Pie
ingredients: salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Preheat oven to 375째F (190째C).
In a large pot, boil potatoes until tender. Drain and mash with milk and butter. Season with salt and pepper.
While the potatoes are boiling, heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add ground meat and cook until browned. Drain excess fat.
Add onion, carrots, and celery to the skillet. Cook until softened.
Stir in garlic, tomato paste, thyme, and rosemary. Cook for 1 minute.
Pour in beef broth and red wine (if using). Bring to a simmer and cook for 10 minutes, or until the sauce has thickened.
Season with salt and black pepper to taste.
Pour the meat mixture into a 9x13 inch baking dish. Top with the mashed potatoes, spreading evenly.
Use a fork to create ridges on the mashed potato topping.
Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until the topping is golden brown and the filling is bubbly.

name: Pad Thai
instructions: Soak rice noodles in warm water for 30 minutes, or until softened. Drain and set aside.
In a small bowl, whisk together fish sauce, tamarind paste, lime juice, brown sugar, and red pepper flakes. Set aside.
Heat vegetable oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add garlic and shrimp. Cook until shrimp is pink.
Push the shrimp and garlic to one side of the skillet. Pour the scrambled egg onto the other side and cook until set. Break up the egg with a spatula.
Add the softened noodles and the sauce to the skillet. Toss to combine and cook for 2-3 minutes.
Stir in bean sprouts and half of the peanuts. Toss to combine.
Serve hot, garnished with the remaining peanuts and fresh cilantro.

name: Chicken Parmesan
instructions: Preheat oven to 400째F (200째C).
Pound each chicken breast to a uniform thickness.
In a shallow dish, combine flour, salt, and black pepper.
In a separate shallow dish, place the beaten eggs.
In a third shallow dish, combine breadcrumbs and Parmesan cheese.
Dredge each chicken breast in the flour, then dip in the egg, and finally coat in the breadcrumb mixture, pressing to adhere.
Heat vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Fry the chicken for 3-4 minutes per side, or until golden brown.
Transfer the fried chicken to a baking dish. Top each piece with marinara sauce and mozzarella cheese.
Bake for 10-15 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.

name: Black Bean Burgers
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can black beans, rinsed and mashed
salt and black pepper to taste
lettuce, tomato, and avocado for serving
instructions: In a large bowl, combine the mashed black beans, breadcrumbs, onion, bell pepper, garlic, cumin, chili powder, cilantro, egg, salt, and black pepper.
Mix well and form into 4 patties.
Heat a lightly oiled skillet over medium-high heat. Cook the patties for 3-4 minutes per side, or until golden brown.
Serve the patties on the hamburger buns with lettuce, tomato, and avocado.

name: Fish and Chips
ingredients: 1 lb cod fillets, cut into 2-inch pieces
instructions: In a small bowl, whisk together flour, baking powder, salt, and black pepper. Stir in the cold beer until just combined.
Heat vegetable oil in a large pot or deep fryer to 375째F (190째C).
Fry the potatoes in batches until golden brown and crispy. Drain on a paper towel-lined plate and season with salt.
Dip each piece of cod into the batter, letting any excess drip off.
Carefully place the battered fish in the hot oil. Fry for 3-4 minutes per side, or until golden brown and cooked through. Drain on a paper towel-lined plate.
Serve the fried fish with the fries.

name: Chicken Pot Pie
ingredients: salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Preheat oven to 400째F (200째C).
In a large pot, melt butter over medium heat. Add onion, carrots, and celery. Cook until softened, about 5-7 minutes.
Stir in flour and cook for 1 more minute.
Gradually whisk in chicken broth and heavy cream. Bring to a simmer, stirring constantly, until the sauce has thickened.
Stir in shredded chicken, peas, and thyme. Season with salt and black pepper to taste.
Pour the mixture into a 9-inch pie dish.
Place the puff pastry sheet over the pie dish, pressing it down the sides. Cut a few slits in the top to allow steam to escape.
Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown and the filling is bubbly.

name: Chicken Fajitas
ingredients: 1 lb boneless, skinless chicken breast, cut into strips
salsa, sour cream, and guacamole for serving
instructions: In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium-high heat. Add chicken strips and cook until browned.
Add onion and bell peppers. Cook until softened, about 5-7 minutes.
Stir in the fajita seasoning and cook for 1 more minute.
Warm the tortillas according to package directions.
Serve the chicken and vegetable mixture in the warm tortillas with salsa, sour cream, and guacamole.

name: Broccoli Cheddar Soup
ingredients: salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: In a large pot, melt butter over medium heat. Add onion and carrots. Cook until softened, about 5-7 minutes.
Add broccoli florets and cook for 2 more minutes.
Pour in chicken or vegetable broth and bring to a simmer. Cook for 10-15 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender.
Using an immersion blender, blend the soup until smooth. Alternatively, transfer the soup to a regular blender and blend in batches.
Stir in heavy cream and cheddar cheese. Cook until the cheese is melted and the soup is smooth. Do not boil.
Season with nutmeg, salt, and black pepper to taste.
Serve hot.

name: Lemon Herb Roasted Chicken
ingredients: salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Preheat oven to 425째F (220째C).
Pat the chicken dry with paper towels.
Rub the chicken all over with olive oil. Season with salt and black pepper.
Stuff the chicken cavity with the lemon halves, garlic halves, and onion quarters.
Sprinkle the chopped rosemary and thyme over the chicken.
Place the chicken in a roasting pan and roast for 1 hour and 15 minutes, or until a meat thermometer inserted into the thickest part of the thigh reads 165째F (74째C).
Let the chicken rest for 10 minutes before carving and serving.

name: Spaghetti and Meatballs
instructions: In a large bowl, combine ground beef, breadcrumbs, Parmesan cheese, egg, garlic, parsley, salt, and black pepper. Mix well and form into 1-inch meatballs.
In a large pot, bring a pot of salted water to a boil. Cook spaghetti according to package directions. Drain.
While the pasta is cooking, brown the meatballs in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Drain excess fat.
Pour in crushed tomatoes and tomato sauce. Bring to a simmer, then reduce heat to low, cover, and cook for 20 minutes, or until the meatballs are cooked through.
Serve the meatballs and sauce over the cooked spaghetti.

name: Chicken Tenders
instructions: In a shallow dish, combine flour, salt, and black pepper.
In a separate shallow dish, place the beaten eggs.
In a third shallow dish, place the breadcrumbs.
Dredge each chicken tender in the flour, then dip in the egg, and finally coat in the breadcrumbs.
Heat vegetable oil in a large skillet or deep fryer to 350째F (175째C).
Fry the chicken tenders in batches for 3-4 minutes per side, or until golden brown and cooked through. Drain on a paper towel-lined plate.
Serve with your favorite dipping sauces.

name: Creamy Tomato Soup
ingredients: salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: In a large pot, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
Stir in garlic and cook for 1 more minute.
Pour in crushed tomatoes and vegetable broth. Bring to a simmer.
Using an immersion blender, blend the soup until smooth. Alternatively, transfer the soup to a regular blender and blend in batches.
Stir in heavy cream and dried basil. Cook for 2-3 minutes, or until heated through. Do not boil.
Season with salt and black pepper to taste.
Serve hot with a dollop of sour cream or croutons.

name: Apple Pie
ingredients: 1 tablespoon butter, cut into small pieces
instructions: Preheat oven to 425째F (220째C).
In a large bowl, toss the sliced apples with white sugar, brown sugar, flour, cinnamon, nutmeg, and lemon juice.
Place one pie crust in a 9-inch pie dish. Pour the apple mixture into the crust.
Dot with the pieces of butter.
Top with the second pie crust, crimping the edges to seal. Cut a few slits in the top to allow steam to escape.
Bake for 15 minutes, then reduce the oven temperature to 375째F (190째C) and bake for an additional 40-45 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown and the filling is bubbly.

name: Grilled Salmon
instructions: Preheat grill to medium-high heat.
Brush the salmon fillets with olive oil. Season with salt and black pepper.
Place the salmon on the grill, skin-side down. Top with a slice of lemon and sprinkle with fresh dill.
Grill for 6-8 minutes, or until the salmon is cooked through and flakes easily with a fork.

name: Chicken Curry
ingredients: 1 lb boneless, skinless chicken breast, cut into 1-inch cubes
salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: In a large pot, heat vegetable oil over medium-high heat. Add onion and cook until softened.
Stir in garlic and ginger and cook for 1 minute.
Add chicken and cook until browned on all sides.
Stir in curry powder, turmeric, and garam masala. Cook for 1 more minute.
Pour in crushed tomatoes and coconut milk. Bring to a simmer, then reduce heat to low, cover, and cook for 20 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through.
Season with salt and black pepper to taste.
Stir in fresh cilantro and serve hot with rice.

name: Vegetable Fried Rice
instructions: In a large skillet or wok, heat vegetable oil over medium-high heat. Add carrots, peas, and onion. Cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
Stir in garlic and cook for 1 more minute.
Push the vegetables to one side of the skillet. Pour the beaten eggs onto the other side and cook, scrambling with a spatula.
Stir the vegetables and eggs together. Add the chilled cooked rice and stir to combine.
Pour in the soy sauce and sesame oil. Stir-fry for 3-5 minutes, or until the rice is heated through and the flavors have melded.
Serve hot.

name: Tuna Salad Sandwich
ingredients: salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: In a medium bowl, combine tuna, mayonnaise, celery, red onion, and Dijon mustard. Mix well.
Season with salt and black pepper to taste.
Spread the tuna salad on one slice of bread. Top with lettuce and the second slice of bread.
Serve immediately.

name: Chicken Alfredo
ingredients: 2 boneless, skinless chicken breasts, cut into cubes
salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Cook fettuccine according to package directions. Drain.
While the pasta is cooking, heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add chicken cubes and cook until browned and cooked through.
Remove chicken from the skillet and set aside.
Reduce heat to low. Add garlic to the skillet and cook for 1 minute until fragrant.
Pour in heavy cream and bring to a simmer. Cook for 3-5 minutes, or until the sauce has thickened.
Stir in Parmesan cheese until melted and the sauce is smooth.
Add the cooked fettuccine and chicken to the skillet. Toss to coat with the sauce.
Season with salt and black pepper to taste. Stir in fresh parsley.
Serve hot.

name: Mango Salsa
instructions: In a medium bowl, combine the diced mangoes, red bell pepper, red onion, jalape챰o, and cilantro.
Stir in the lime juice and salt.
Serve immediately with tortilla chips or grilled chicken or fish.

name: Chicken and Broccoli Stir-Fry
ingredients: 1 lb boneless, skinless chicken breast, cut into strips
1 large head of broccoli, cut into florets
instructions: In a small bowl, whisk together soy sauce, cornstarch, honey, ginger, and garlic. Add water and set aside.
Heat vegetable oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add chicken strips and cook until browned and cooked through.
Add broccoli florets and red bell pepper. Stir-fry for 5-7 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender-crisp.
Pour the sauce over the chicken and vegetables and stir until the sauce has thickened and everything is coated.
Serve hot over rice.

name: Mashed Potatoes
ingredients: salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: In a large pot, boil potatoes until tender. Drain well.
Return the potatoes to the pot. Mash with milk and butter.
Season with salt and black pepper to taste.
Serve hot.

name: Chicken Noodle Casserole
ingredients: 1 (10.5 ounce) can cream of chicken soup
instructions: Preheat oven to 375째F (190째C).
Cook egg noodles according to package directions. Drain.
In a large bowl, combine the cooked egg noodles, shredded chicken, cream of chicken soup, milk, and frozen peas and carrots.
Stir until everything is well combined.
Pour the mixture into an 8x8 inch baking dish. Top with the shredded cheddar cheese and crushed potato chips (if using).
Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until the casserole is bubbly and the cheese is melted.
Serve hot.

name: Smashed Potatoes
instructions: Preheat oven to 425째F (220째C).
In a large pot, boil potatoes until tender. Drain well.
Place the boiled potatoes on a baking sheet. Using a fork or the bottom of a glass, gently smash each potato until it is flattened.
Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and black pepper.
Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until the potatoes are golden brown and crispy.
Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese and fresh parsley before serving.

name: Chicken and Rice
ingredients: 1 lb boneless, skinless chicken breast, cut into cubes
salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: In a large pot, heat olive oil over medium-high heat. Add chicken cubes and cook until browned on all sides.
Remove chicken from the pot and set aside.
Add onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
Stir in garlic and cook for 1 more minute.
Add rice and stir to coat. Pour in chicken broth and bring to a boil.
Return the chicken to the pot. Stir in frozen peas and carrots and thyme. Season with salt and black pepper.
Reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer for 20 minutes, or until the rice is cooked through and the liquid has been absorbed.
Serve hot.

name: Beef and Broccoli
ingredients: 1 large head of broccoli, cut into florets
instructions: In a small bowl, whisk together soy sauce, cornstarch, honey, ginger, and garlic. Add water and set aside.
Heat vegetable oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add beef and cook until browned.
Add broccoli florets and stir-fry for 5-7 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender-crisp.
Pour the sauce over the beef and vegetables and stir until the sauce has thickened and everything is coated.
Serve hot over rice.

name: Chicken Caesar Salad
ingredients: salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium-high heat. Season chicken breasts with salt and black pepper.
Cook the chicken for 5-7 minutes per side, or until cooked through. Let rest for 5 minutes, then slice.
In a large bowl, combine the chopped romaine lettuce, croutons, and Parmesan cheese.
Pour the Caesar dressing over the salad and toss to coat.
Top with the sliced chicken and serve immediately.

name: Chicken and Dumplings
ingredients: salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: In a large pot, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add carrots, celery, and onion. Cook until softened, about 5-7 minutes.
Stir in garlic and cook for 1 more minute.
Pour in chicken broth and bring to a boil. Add shredded chicken, thyme, and rosemary.
In a separate bowl, whisk together flour, baking powder, and salt. Stir in milk and melted butter until just combined.
Drop the dumpling batter by spoonfuls into the simmering soup.
Reduce heat to low, cover, and cook for 15 minutes, or until the dumplings are cooked through.
Season with salt and black pepper to taste.
Serve hot.

name: Baked Ziti
instructions: Preheat oven to 375째F (190째C).
Cook ziti pasta according to package directions. Drain.
In a large pot, brown ground beef with onion and garlic. Drain excess fat.
Stir in crushed tomatoes, tomato sauce, salt, pepper, oregano, and basil. Simmer for 15 minutes.
In a medium bowl, mix ricotta, egg, and Parmesan cheese.
In a large bowl, combine the cooked pasta, meat sauce, ricotta mixture, and half of the mozzarella cheese.
Pour the mixture into a 9x13 inch baking dish. Top with the remaining mozzarella cheese.
Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until the cheese is bubbly and golden brown.
Let stand for 10 minutes before serving.

name: Chicken and Waffles
ingredients: 1 lb boneless, skinless chicken breast, cut into strips
instructions: In a shallow dish, combine flour, paprika, cayenne pepper, garlic powder, onion powder, salt, and black pepper.
In a separate shallow dish, whisk together egg and milk.
Dip each chicken strip into the milk mixture, then dredge in the flour mixture, pressing to coat.
Heat vegetable oil in a large skillet to 350째F (175째C).
Fry the chicken strips for 3-4 minutes per side, or until golden brown and cooked through. Drain on a paper towel-lined plate.
Serve the fried chicken on top of the toasted waffles. Drizzle with maple syrup.

name: Beef Stroganoff
ingredients: salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Cook egg noodles according to package directions. Drain and set aside.
While the noodles are cooking, heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add beef and cook until browned.
Remove beef from the skillet and set aside.
Add onion and mushrooms to the skillet and cook until softened.
Stir in garlic and cook for 1 more minute.
Pour in beef broth and bring to a simmer, scraping up any browned bits from the bottom of the skillet.
In a small bowl, whisk together sour cream, heavy cream, Dijon mustard, and paprika.
Reduce heat to low and stir the sour cream mixture into the skillet. Return the beef to the skillet and cook for 2-3 minutes, or until heated through. Do not boil.
Season with salt and black pepper to taste.
Serve the beef and sauce over the cooked egg noodles.

name: Shepherd's Pie
ingredients: salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Preheat oven to 375째F (190째C).
In a large pot, boil potatoes until tender. Drain and mash with milk and butter. Season with salt and pepper.
While the potatoes are boiling, heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add ground meat and cook until browned. Drain excess fat.
Add onion, carrots, and celery to the skillet. Cook until softened.
Stir in garlic, tomato paste, thyme, and rosemary. Cook for 1 minute.
Pour in beef broth and red wine (if using). Bring to a simmer and cook for 10 minutes, or until the sauce has thickened.
Season with salt and black pepper to taste.
Pour the meat mixture into a 9x13 inch baking dish. Top with the mashed potatoes, spreading evenly.
Use a fork to create ridges on the mashed potato topping.
Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until the topping is golden brown and the filling is bubbly.

name: Pad Thai
instructions: Soak rice noodles in warm water for 30 minutes, or until softened. Drain and set aside.
In a small bowl, whisk together fish sauce, tamarind paste, lime juice, brown sugar, and red pepper flakes. Set aside.
Heat vegetable oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add garlic and shrimp. Cook until shrimp is pink.
Push the shrimp and garlic to one side of the skillet. Pour the scrambled egg onto the other side and cook until set. Break up the egg with a spatula.
Add the softened noodles and the sauce to the skillet. Toss to combine and cook for 2-3 minutes.
Stir in bean sprouts and half of the peanuts. Toss to combine.
Serve hot, garnished with the remaining peanuts and fresh cilantro.

In a separate shallow dish, place the beaten eggs.
In a third shallow dish, combine breadcrumbs and Parmesan cheese.

Heat vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Fry the chicken for 3-4 minutes per side, or until golden brown.

Bake for 10-15 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.

Mix well and form into 4 patties.
Heat a lightly oiled skillet over medium-high heat. Cook the patties for 3-4 minutes per side, or until golden brown.

Carefully place the battered fish in the hot oil. Fry for 3-4 minutes per side, or until golden brown and cooked through. Drain on a paper towel-lined plate.

Place the salmon on the grill, skin-side down. Top with a slice of lemon and sprinkle with fresh dill.

name: Tuna Salad Sandwich
ingredients: salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: In a medium bowl, combine tuna, mayonnaise, celery, red onion, and Dijon mustard. Mix well.
Season with salt and black pepper to taste.
Spread the tuna salad on one slice of bread. Top with lettuce and the second slice of bread.
Serve immediately.

name: Chicken Alfredo
ingredients: 2 boneless, skinless chicken breasts, cut into cubes
salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Cook fettuccine according to package directions. Drain.
While the pasta is cooking, heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add chicken cubes and cook until browned and cooked through.
Remove chicken from the skillet and set aside.
Reduce heat to low. Add garlic to the skillet and cook for 1 minute until fragrant.
Pour in heavy cream and bring to a simmer. Cook for 3-5 minutes, or until the sauce has thickened.
Stir in Parmesan cheese until melted and the sauce is smooth.
Add the cooked fettuccine and chicken to the skillet. Toss to coat with the sauce.
Season with salt and black pepper to taste. Stir in fresh parsley.
Serve hot.
